DOC.brief_summary: Hopefully this research can help to provide the optimal nutrition management from pregnancy so that the babies wiil born with better quality of health and reduce the morbidity and mortality. Until now, there is no data regarding probiotics in Indonesien breastmilk and the role of probiotics supplementation on pregnant women to the baby especially from inflammation pathways. The investigators hope the result of this research can help reducing infant morbidity and mortality rate in Indonesia, also has a benefit for future research.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Bifidobacterium Animalis Ssp Lactis DR10 Supplementation in Women During Pregnancy and Lactation on Breast Milk IL-8 and Gut Mucosa Integrity in Infant
DOC.criteria: pregnant women ,gestation age 3234 weeks, normal pregnancy, plan to deliver spontaneously, no antibiotic tend to give exclusive breastfeeding want to join the research well doing baby pregnant women with preeclampsia,bleeding,infection,premature rupture of the membrane or other chronic disease plan to deliver by caesarean section
